name.jp: ジャイアント・ポップクランク召喚のオーブ

description.en: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ar: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.br: Irá invocar uma Rainha Popcrank. Para usar, clique vezes no item e depois clique no chão para invocar o Gigante.
description.cns: 能召唤诡异小丑的魔法晶球
description.fi: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fil: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.fr: Invoque un Roi Joker pour une heure. Double-cliquez puis sélectionner une zone au sol pour l'utiliser.
description.id: Memungkinkan Anda untuk memanggil Queen Popcrank. Untuk menggunakannya, klik dua kali, dan pilih area di tanah terdekat untuk memanggil Giant.
description.it: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.jp: ジャイアント・ポップクランクを召喚する魔法のオーブ。召喚したい場所をクリックすると出現します。
description.kr: 퀸 팝크랭크 를 소환 하는 마법 구슬. 사용하려면 두 번 클릭한 다음 자이언트를 호출할 영역을 선택합니다.
description.nl: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.pl: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.ru: Шар призыва клоунессы. Дважды щелкните по шару, а затем укажите место на земле, где должен появиться монстр.
description.sp: Te permite invocar a una Reina Popcrank. Para usarlo, haz doble click y selecciona el lugar donde quieras invocarla.
description.sw: Allows you to summon a Queen Popcrank. To use, double click it, and select an area on the ground nearby to summon the Giant.
description.th: ให้คุณอัญเชิญQueen Popcrank ให้ดับเบิ้ลคลิกและเลือกพื้นที่ที่อยู่ใกล้เคียงเพื่ออัญเชิญไจแอนท์
description.tw: 能召喚詭異小丑的魔法晶球。要使用，請雙點擊它，然後選擇地面上的一個區域來召喚更大隻的。
description.vi: Cho phép bạn triệu hồi Queen Popcrank. Để sử dụng, hãy nhấp đúp vào nó và chọn một khu vực trên mặt đất gần đó để triệu hồi Người khổng lồ.
